summary: This bill, the "Stopping Teachers Unions from Damaging Education Needs Today Act" (STUDENT Act), aims to impose new requirements on the National Education Association (NEA). It seeks to restrict the NEA's political activities, mandate certain membership requirements, and prohibit the NEA from promoting specific ideologies related to race, gender, and antisemitism. The bill also includes provisions related to labor practices and repeals the NEA's property tax exemption in the District of Columbia.
